titleStmt.title: A defence of true Protestants, abused for the service of popery, under the name of Presbyterians in a dialogue between A. and L. two sons of the church : where it is debated, whether discenting Presbyterians be as bad or worse than papists : and other popish assertions are detected.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for N.P., and sold by Rich. Janua ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
